title: Cheesy Portabella Pizzas
directions: Heat oven to 400* lay out a sheet of tin foil in a pan with sides (so juices don’t leak) then spread olive oil around on the tin foil (just enough so the caps don’t stick)
Spoon about 2 Tbsp tomato sauce into each cap, sprinkle with Mozzarella, then Parmesan, then Cheddar, then spices
Bake 25 minutes until cheese is melty
ingredients: 2 oz Cabot extra sharp light Cheddar, shredded
